General Info
Chick-fil-A is one of the largest, family-owned and operated, private chain of more than 1,300 restaurants in over 35 U.S. states. The chain s restaurants serve a selection of salads, side items, drinks, desserts, condiments, dressings, sauces and wraps. It sells products in schools, universities, hospitals and airports. Chick-fil-A also offers gift cards and certificates of several denominations. The chain provides clothing, gears and gadgets. Its restaurants menus include nuggets, chicken sandwiches, hash browns, and egg and cheese biscuits. In addition, it offers franchising opportunities. The chain s restaurants accept online orders. It manages over 20 drive-thru restaurants in the United States. The chain owns and operates Dwarf House and Truett s Grill restaurants. Chick-fil-A additionally provides online meal calculators.

3 stars
jerrybdodd 03/09/2012
Good food and very profitable fast food…
Good food and very profitable fast food restaurant. So profitable, that in order to get more money, they have discontinued the free senior drink which amounted to a drink of your choice in a kidde cup. Not a very good move fellows. I'll put you in the ranks of the big banks that are nickel and dime their customers. I'm not very motivated to patronize you again!
